data.name: The Wild Eternal - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Wild Eternal soundtrack aims to capture the mood of 80's adventure movies, such as The Never-ending Story, Dark Crystal and similar. The soundtrack is provided for free with every purchase of The Wild Eternal.

NOTE: Steam should auto add the soundtrack to your Steam Music Library, but the files can be found in your Steam directory (Steam\steamapps\common\The Wild Eternal\soundtrack) if you wish to move them elsewhere.

TRACK LIST


1. Ilsanjo - 00:09
2. Pyramid - 03:49
3. Beginning of a Journey - 01:56
4. Entering the Garden - 02:38
5. Garden of Lost Dreams - 06:43
6. Kapilavastu - 03:49
7. The Living Hills - 06:29
8. Statues of Mysterious Stature - 02:11
9. In Search of Liberation - 02:53
10. Entering Wakening Lands - 03:24
11. Wakening Lands - 06:19
12. Entering Hollow Stones - 03:40
13. Hollow Stones - 04:57
14. The Dreams of Weavers - 04:01
15. Trailer - 01:31
16. The Wild Eternal - 04:00
